title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.14 - Lighting and ventilation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.14 - Lighting and ventilation

State Regulations

Lighting fixtures shall be in sufficient number and properly placed so as to provide adequate illumination. The shop shall be properly and adequately ventilated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
10.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
